<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 14"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Keep up the Good Fight](/Feats.aspx?ID=3586) <actions string="Reaction" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Knights of Lastwall](/Sources.aspx?ID=123) pg. 75

**Archetype** [Knight Vigilant](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=27)

**Frequency**
once per hour

**Prerequisites**
[Knight Vigilant](/Feats.aspx?ID=1092)

**Trigger**
A foe's Strike reduces you to 0 Hit Points.

**Requirements**
You had more than 1 Hit Point before the triggering Strike, and the Strike wouldn't kill you.

</column>

---

Your devotion to helping others and doing good keeps you going, even against insurmountable odds. Instead of being knocked out, you are reduced to 1 Hit Point, gain a number of temporary Hit Points equal to your level for 1 round, and increase your [wounded](/Conditions.aspx?ID=42) value by 1.
name: Keep up the Good Fight
requirement: You had more than 1 Hit Point before the triggering Strike, and the Strike wouldn't kill you.
requirement_markdown: You had more than 1 Hit Point before the triggering Strike, and the Strike wouldn't kill you.
